aa.description: Welcome in the initial room. There is nothing here. You can try going to north, south, east or west.

bb.description: There is a dark, deep pond of water in this room.

cc.description: There is a bucket in this room.

dd.description: There is fire in this room! You can only go back to west.

ee.description: There is locked door in this room. You have to possess a special key to be able to gain access to the next room.
ee.hidden-description: There is a unlocked door in this room. You can continue to west.

ff.description: There is a magic key in this very dark room!
